General.Name: Changjiang Publishing & Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Changjiang Publishing & Media Co.,Ltd operates as a media publishing company in China. The company engages in the publication, distribution, printing, and material trade of books, periodicals, newspapers, audio-visual products, and electronic publications. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Worldbest Industry Development Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Wuhan, China. Changjiang Publishing & Media Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Hubei Changjiang Publishing and Media Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 268, Xiongchu Main Street, Wuhan, China, 430070
